column2: The  learned  Trial  Judge  has  not  taken  into  consideration  that

the  version  of the  prosecution 
relating 
to 
the  arrest  of the
Accused Appellant fails  the test of probability and credibility.
The learned Trial Judge has  erred  in  law by  failing to  evaluate
that the  prosecution  has  not  proven  the  'chain '  relaying  to  the
